Title: Jesus, Mary And Joe Cocker
Plot: Ellen convinces Katie to testify against Arthur Frobisher, which has him considering drastic measures. Patty begins to question if Katie is giving honest and accurate testimony.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
Writer: Todd A. Kessler, Glenn Kessler, Daniel Zelman
GuestStars: Casey Siemaszko, Maya Days, Victor Arnold, Saundra Santiago, David Costabile, Ethan Herschenfeld, Kevin Isola, Damian Young, Matt Salinger, Vanessa Elese, Ryan Dunn, Ashley Marie Greiner, Elliot Korte, Peggy Gorml
